section.10: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas said:"The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) entered upon us and the only people present were myself, my mother, the orphan and Umm Harh, my maternal aunt. He said: 'Stand up and I will lead you in prayer.' It was not the time for a (prescribed) prayer. And he led us in prayer
